pages.title: Kamen Rider XGeats
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Geats: 4 Aces and the Black Fox (2023, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:geats/devices/desire_driver#desire_driver_x_geats)Desire Driver (XGeats)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Slash V$(li)Speed VII$(li)Luck$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste IV$(li)Jump Boost VI$(li)Boost V$(li)Strength VI
